description:
Provide real-time and comprehensive cryptocurrency and DeFi data from multiple trusted Sources. 

Enable AI assistants to access market data, trending coins, protocol analytics, and more with intelligent rate limiting and caching for optimal performance. 

Integrate seamlessly with MCP clients to enhance your crypto-related applications and workflows.

SCRY_API_KEY.description: Your Scry API key (required for Scry endpoints). Get one at https://scry.space/

capabilities.name: coingecko_get_trending_coins
capabilities.description: Discover trending cryptocurrencies based on real-time search activity from CoinGecko users. Use for identifying market attention, viral projects, and emerging opportunities. Updated every few hours with search volume rankings. This is unique CoinGecko data not available elsewhere.

capabilities.name: get_top_protocols
capabilities.description: Get top DeFi protocols ranked by TVL with filtering by category and blockchain. Recommended over get_protocols for manageable result sets that won't overwhelm responses. Returns formatted TVL values, 24h changes, and chain distribution data for quick protocol discovery.

capabilities.name: defillama_get_protocols_paginated
capabilities.description: Browse DeFi protocols with pagination and sorting for comprehensive market analysis. Use for large datasets when get_top_protocols isn't sufficient. Returns structured data with pagination controls and flexible sorting options.

capabilities.name: defillama_search_protocols
capabilities.description: Search for DeFi protocols by name, symbol, category, or description. Returns matching protocols sorted by TVL.

capabilities.name: get_historical_tvl
capabilities.description: Get monthly aggregated TVL data for any protocol, returning highest, mean, and lowest TVL for each month. This prevents context window overflow while providing comprehensive historical insights. Data is automatically aggregated from daily values during caching.

capabilities.name: defillama_get_chain_historical_tvl
capabilities.description: Get historical TVL data for blockchain ecosystems to track capital flows and identify mercenary capital patterns across chains.

capabilities.name: defillama_get_protocol_fees_history
capabilities.description: Get historical fees and revenue data to analyze protocol sustainability and real value generation beyond TVL incentives.

capabilities.name: defillama_get_yields_historical
capabilities.description: Get historical yield/APY data for liquidity pools to analyze incentive effectiveness and reward sustainability patterns.

capabilities.name: defillama_get_stablecoin_historical
capabilities.description: Get historical stablecoin circulation data to track capital flows and identify mercenary capital patterns through stablecoin movement.

capabilities.name: defillama_compare_protocols_historical
capabilities.description: Compare historical TVL data across multiple protocols to identify relative performance and capital flow patterns.

capabilities.name: get_dex_volume
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive trading volume data for both spot and perpetuals trading. Automatically searches both DEX and derivatives APIs to provide complete volume analysis. Supports major protocols like Uniswap, Curve (spot) and GMX, Hyperliquid, dYdX (perpetuals). Returns separate data for spot and perpetuals when both are available.

capabilities.name: get_derivatives_overview
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive derivatives/perpetuals trading volume data for all protocols. Essential for perpetual DEX competitive analysis. Includes GMX, dYdX, Hyperliquid, Jupiter Perps, and other major perpetual trading platforms.

capabilities.name: get_derivatives_volume
capabilities.description: Get detailed volume data for a specific derivatives/perpetuals protocol with historical analysis. Use for in-depth analysis of individual perpetual DEX protocols like GMX, dYdX, Hyperliquid, etc.

capabilities.name: get_protocol_revenue_overview
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive revenue and fees data for all DeFi protocols. Shows which protocols generate real revenue vs just TVL. Essential for analyzing protocol sustainability and value generation.

capabilities.name: debank_get_top_holders
capabilities.description: Get top holders of a token using DeBank API. Returns ranked list of holders with addresses and amounts.

capabilities.name: debank_get_user_chains
capabilities.description: Get list of chains where a user has activity using DeBank API. Includes wallet birth timestamps.

capabilities.name: debank_get_user_history
capabilities.description: Get user's transaction history on a specific chain using DeBank API.

capabilities.name: debank_get_user_tokens
capabilities.description: Get user's token balances on a specific chain using DeBank API.

capabilities.name: debank_get_user_all_tokens
capabilities.description: Get user's token balances across all chains using DeBank API.

capabilities.name: debank_get_user_protocols
capabilities.description: Get user's DeFi protocol positions on a specific chain using DeBank API.

capabilities.name: debank_get_user_authorizations
capabilities.description: Get user's token approvals and authorizations on a specific chain using DeBank API.

capabilities.name: debank_analyze_token_holders
capabilities.description: Perform comprehensive holder analysis for a token including cross-chain activity and portfolio similarities.

capabilities.name: get_current_price
capabilities.description: Get current cryptocurrency prices with automatic source selection and intelligent fallbacks. Use for price discovery when you don't know which data source to use. Supports symbols (BTC, ETH), names (Bitcoin, Ethereum), or contract addresses across CoinGecko, CoinMarketCap, and DeFiLlama.

capabilities.name: compare_prices
capabilities.description: Compare current prices of multiple cryptocurrencies side by side with sorting and ranking. Use for market analysis, portfolio tracking, and relative performance assessment. Maximum 20 assets per request for optimal performance.

capabilities.name: get_historical_price
capabilities.description: Get historical price data with intelligent multi-source aggregation for comprehensive trend analysis. Use for volatility assessment, pattern recognition, and performance tracking over custom timeframes. Automatically combines data from multiple sources for optimal coverage.

capabilities.name: get_price_analytics
capabilities.description: Generate comprehensive price analytics including volatility metrics, trend analysis, support/resistance levels, and technical indicators. Use for investment analysis, risk assessment, and trading insights with professional-grade calculations.

capabilities.name: search_assets
capabilities.description: Search for cryptocurrencies using smart matching. Supports partial names, symbols, categories, and more

capabilities.name: get_assets_by_category
capabilities.description: Get all cryptocurrencies in a specific category with current price data

capabilities.name: arkham_transfers_query
capabilities.description: üîç Query Arkham Intelligence for blockchain transfer data with advanced entity and flow filtering. Supports entity-based analysis, exchange identification, and comprehensive transfer tracking across multiple chains.

capabilities.name: arkham_net_flow_by_wallet
capabilities.description: üìä Calculate net inflow/outflow analysis for wallets or entities with optional token filtering. Provides comprehensive flow analysis by token with USD valuations.

capabilities.name: arkham_exchange_deposit_activity

capabilities.name: arkham_entity_transfer_matrix

capabilities.name: arkham_wallet_activation_monitor
capabilities.description: üîç Monitor wallet activation patterns, detecting first activity or post-funding behaviors for security and compliance analysis.

capabilities.name: arkham_stablecoin_flows

capabilities.description: üèÜ Get comprehensive metrics for the top 10 institutional tokens (BTC, ETH, SOL, HYPE, ENA, SUI, XRP). Includes price data, volume metrics, calculated ratios, and DeFi protocol data in a single unified response. Perfect for institutional trading analysis and market overview.
